item.title: First post
item.description: How is this website build and the idea behind ? This websites runs using HUGO which static website engine. HUGO makes it really easy to add and remove content. I used a very simple and minimal template called hermit. As I learned from my friend Humaid it is more important to focus on content rather than some fancy JS animations.
item.content:
How is this website build and the idea behind ?

This websites runs using HUGO which static website engine. HUGO makes it really easy to add and remove content. I used a very simple and minimal template called hermit. As I learned from my friend Humaid it is more important to focus on content rather than some fancy JS animations.
